pkgmetadata.longdescription:
JNI component for the usrsctp library
The jitsi-sctp project creates a JNI wrapper around the usrsctp library and provides a set of Java classes to further flesh out a convenient Java SCTP API, which can be used on Linux, MacOS X, FreeBSD and Windows.
The ebuild uses a fork which can create a native platform specific artefact for aarch64 (required by e.g. the Jitsi Videobridge on ARMv8a platforms in 64-bit mode), as well as for the more common x86_64 architecture.
